lender.name: Lewis & Donna
lender.loan_because: it has been said "give a man a fish and you feed him for a day, but teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime." We hope to help people change their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Lewis is an investigator with the Texas Department of Public Safety. Donna is an RN at a local hospital.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: it is action.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I think it's the best way to enable others to achieve success.

lender.name: Radko
lender.loan_because: I want and who knows, maybe people who I help today will help somebody else sometimes in the future.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I think everyone should be able to be a proud business owner if they are willing to work hard.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company invest our money in very large businesses and help them to grow and make more profit.

lender.name: Jorge & Diana
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make themselves successful.
lender.occupational_info: Diana works with computer software while I design web sites.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Why wouldn't you?
lender.occupational_info: As I am retired I mainly do community work where I now live and I am an active member of Rotary.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: As a woman who is blessed with so much I would like ot lighten the load of another women.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired but worked in surgery for 38 years

lender.name: Russ
lender.loan_because: Someday, and that day may never come, I'll call upon you to do a service for me. But until that day accept this as a gift .
lender.occupational_info: Adventurous

lender.name: Nine
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small charity providing support to sex workers.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I want to help development across the globe
lender.occupational_info: I am studying Economics.

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: People need direct help. Not relying on governments and losing the money in the process.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Through my travels I see how little it takes to make someone smile. If I can help, then I smile too.
lender.occupational_info: I love my job. I get to discover something new every day, and I don't have to wear heels.

lender.name: Pai Glee
lender.loan_because: We should all do more small things with great love...I plan to add more loans to my portfolio throughout 2011-2012.
lender.occupational_info:
Finance grad from the top undergraduate business school in the US. Researched socially-responsible investments (SRI) and sustainable banking in grad school back in 2003! Wall Street financial and healthcare reform loooong overdue...!
Currently Reading: Screw Business As Usual by Richard Branson http://www.amazon.com/Screw-Business-Usual-Richard-Branson/dp/1591844347

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I believe we have to do what we can to raise standards of living in other areas of the world. Furthermore, I want to cultivate and encourage the entrepreneurial spirit in individuals that live in areas where it is often difficult to succeed. I firmly believe in "a hand up- not a hand out."
lender.occupational_info:
I buy and sell vehicles (cars, trucks, rvs, etc) as well as work as a loan originator at an office that assists borrowers seeking short-term secured lending. Our company also offers residential and commercial property management services from our office in Boise. I live in Meridian with my wife, Misty- and have an adult son, named Alex. We enjoy camping, boating, hiking, travel, snowshoeing, amateur radio (KC7CBF) and photography. (www.flickr.com/kc7cbf)
Be sure to SHOW ME "KIVA LOVE!!!" If you heard of Kiva from me- please list my email as your referrer when you sign up- then I can keep up with you on Kiva! Nick(a)e2800.com -Thanks! .

lender.name: Oren
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of people to succeed, I love people that follow their dream.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do, and Kiva is the right way to do it.
lender.occupational_info: I fly rescue helicopters for the United States Air Force.

lender.name: albert
lender.loan_because: some one out there may be the next bill gate's, and all they need is a little help with the first step. a dollar may not go far here in the US, but it goes a long way some where else.
lender.occupational_info: Flight line mechanic for southwest airlines. our maintenance motto is " We Make'm Fly Safe"

lender.name: Roy
lender.loan_because: As apreciation to those who work hard to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I purchase vintage houses in poor condition, restore them to their original beauty for re-sale.

lender.name: Linda & Family*
lender.loan_because: Im human

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: So many have helped me to help myself...
lender.occupational_info: I write books.

lender.name: John M.
lender.loan_because: A microloan can create a world of opportunity to an entrepeneur. This is a good way to help my global neighbors.
lender.occupational_info: Finance - retirement plans for small and mid-size businesses.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping make a long term difference in the world, and I believe in the power of the individual.
lender.occupational_info: Before I retired, I was an engineer working on designing trucks for a US manufacturer.

lender.name: EhTosh
lender.loan_because: we all belong to one another.

lender.name: Barbara + Bob
lender.loan_because: Time to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Barbara is a retired teacher. Bob is the Chief Operating Officer for a bank.

lender.name: Seán
lender.loan_because: I believe in microcredit and its ability to help people become free of the cycle of poverty
lender.occupational_info: Improving the world around me in every way possible

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: love your neighbor
lender.occupational_info: marketing consulting

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I want to help....
lender.occupational_info: I help people understand their financial information and consult with them to produce accurate financial reports.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I want to share what I have with people that want to invest in a brighter future.
lender.occupational_info: I write marketing collateral for my company. I write content for my company's Web site. I manage seminars and other events for my company.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: it is the easiest/best way to help

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: Capitalism Rocks!

lender.name: Kohyun
lender.loan_because: I truly believe in this work; help people so that they can catch their own fish.

lender.name: Meg
lender.loan_because: I can do something to help..... every little bit, right?
lender.occupational_info: I am interested in social work, global studies, and helping people around the globe to provide healthy food for their families.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I beleive that we have an obligation to help our neighbors
lender.occupational_info: I help people breathe

lender.name: Ole
lender.loan_because: I believe in developing communities from the ground up, and local entrepreneurs is crucial to that process.

lender.name: jonathon
lender.occupational_info: regeneration of developed and developing cities

lender.name: res
lender.loan_because: i want to begin a business
lender.occupational_info: buy goods and retail them

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: My heart goes out to other mothers who are trying to care for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mother to four daughters.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: This seems like a great way to help and empower people.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: "But we were born of risen apes, not fallen angels, and the apes were armed killers besides. And so what shall we wonder at? Our murders and massacres and missiles, and our irreconcilable regiments? Or our treaties whatever they may be worth; our symphonies however seldom they may be played; our peaceful acres, however frequently they may be converted into battlefields; our dreams however rarely they may be accomplished. The miracle of man is not how far he has sunk but how magnificently he has risen. We are known among the stars by our poems, not our corpses." — Robert Ardrey

lender.name: Nico & Nadine
lender.loan_because: Giving is important and important lesson for us to learn, and direct giving like this lets us see how we can help someone across the world and make a real difference.
lender.occupational_info: We toddle, we play, we cry sometimes, but mostly just enjoy life and teach our parents how to be patient.

lender.name: Andres
lender.loan_because: Kiva has to be one of the best uses of the internet there is. For another, take a minute to look at the work done by www.softpowereducation.com in Uganda. Any donation is welcome and will help hundreds of kids!

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place for my little daughter to grow up.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a university and also help tutor students and refugees in ESL.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: Sometimes I wonder...

lender.name: John A. Ledahawsky
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that need and appreciate my help.
lender.occupational_info: F/T Adventurer P/T Accountant

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I am an account manager for a manufacturing company.

lender.name: Zeffy
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people help themselves. A lending hand can do wonders.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a civil engineer in the land development industry.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: In this world where some of us are so fortunate to have so much while others have so little, it is important to give back to the broader community. Given the opportunity others can do so much to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach courses on Latin America and Third World development.

lender.name: Uju
lender.loan_because: I love helping people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student and a stay-at-home mom

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do for others.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a department of the most wonderful staff that anyone could ever have. We always help those who need it. I am blessed to be able to work with such wonderful people. We work for a health insurance company as analysts.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: it is a wonderful way to "make a difference" by helping others pursue their dreams.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: It's a simple yet incredibly effective way of helping people and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people to help them create more efficient and safer places to live and work.

lender.name: Jenn
lender.loan_because: In order to soar, you must fly. In order to fly, you must jump. Here is the courage to jump!!

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: It feels good and I want to help people create the same good forturne I've experienced.
lender.occupational_info: accountant and business owner

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I had my children choose a business so that they may see how their contribution could help another family somewhere in the world. We hope to continue to add to our portfolio.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it so easy! A few dollars gives people choices and the opportunity to improve life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Thorsten
lender.loan_because: It's a way to support ideas - where not the big money but the small money counts.
lender.occupational_info: Helping with Information Technology to make a change.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: So much can be accomplished with so little!

lender.name: Alexis
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering people directly.
lender.occupational_info: I currently volunteer for a microfinancial group in Mingechevir, Azerbaijan. I am a Community Economic Development PCV.

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate. Whenever I really needed help there was some one there to help me. Living in the USA I have worked hard but always had access to an over abundance of family, friends and the daily necessities of life. Wouldn't it be nice if everyone could say the same thing. Now it's my turn to help some one else.
lender.occupational_info: I help people use their computers to make their job easier for them to do.

lender.name: Moi
lender.loan_because: Couldn't think of a good reason not to.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: We're a global community and to reach out across the world and make even a small difference in someone's life - that helps make the human community stronger. I feel blessed to be able to help someone else realize a dream.
lender.occupational_info: I use a computer to design and produce printed materials for my company to use to promote our products - catalogs, ads, literature. Also I make all the arrangements for my company to exhibit at and participate in trade shows. We sell German-made laboratory products in the USA and Canada.

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: no one should live in poverty if they are committed to bettering their lives through hard work and persistence. Even people who are well off have achieved their success through a variety of loans whether they be car, home, business, or student loans. It is only fair that everybody receives the same opportunity.

lender.name: Brooke
lender.loan_because: I want to shine the light of Christ. I may not be "rich", but God blesses me greatly, and I would like to share my blessings with others!
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a full-time graduate student; I am working on my Master of Arts in Counseling.

lender.name: Yiling
lender.loan_because: everybody need some help sometimes
lender.occupational_info: We provide assistance to access services, such as housing, employment, education to people with mental illness. Our goal is to reduce hospitalization, incarceration and homelessness among people with mental illness.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I have always felt that we should share what we have with others. My parents were very giving people and I strive to be like them.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked for over 20 years in accounting, prior to that I was a medical social worker.

lender.name: laura
lender.loan_because: i can and we should.
lender.occupational_info: Landscaper and student

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I'm so very lucky to have the life I do, and would like to pay a little of that back to someone who hasn't been as fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a federal law enforcement agency as a homicide analyst. We help local law enforcement agencies that are trying to catch violent criminals.

lender.name: Norbert
lender.loan_because: I can afford it and other people need it.

lender.name: Melinda
lender.loan_because: It is a good opportunity to be an active, positive force in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am an instructional multimedia & web development specialist at Northwestern State University, specializing in web, print, and video development and design.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I wish these individuals success in their quests for a better life.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic way to help other people around the world!
lender.occupational_info: I am a legal assistant to two attorneys in a workers compensation practice, helping clients who have had on the job injuries.

lender.name: cathy
lender.loan_because: I want to help women be as self-sufficient as possible and give them the chance to make a better life.

lender.name: AnaP
lender.occupational_info: I work in international development projects in Latin America

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I am 12 years old and with my grandmother we decided to loan because we like helping people who are in need
lender.occupational_info: I just finished the 6th grade.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Jesus has blessed me with a wonderful, Peruvian wife and two children. It is my turn to give back to the Peruvians.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to immigrants from around the world who come to the Washington, DC area to find a new life.

lender.name: bob
lender.loan_because: it works.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I have grandchildren. I wish that all children can have the clean and healthy life that mine do.
lender.occupational_info: My passion is teaching Environmental Science. Especially about the need to live sustainably, leaving the world clean and with enough resources for our children and grandchildren.

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: I have lived and worked in 38 countries around the world. I have seen some of the poorest people in person. I see many hard working people who need access to financial resources to start or expand their business. This is my way to make a meaningful contribution to these individuals who are so dedicated and work so hard in their businesses. I want to pass along some of my good fortune to others.
lender.occupational_info: As a management consultant, I help people to develop and expand their people skills at work. I have enjoyed this work for over 25 years.

lender.name: Philippina
lender.loan_because: Helping parents to provide better for their children, so the next generation will be better educated and prepared to build a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of and educate young children so the parents can work. I use a lot of music and Montessori. I am a single mom of 3 kids (2 in grad school on an RA/TA, 1 in highshool),

lender.name: jimmy
lender.loan_because: to help less fortunate people, help themselves
lender.occupational_info: install & maintain high-speed data eq

lender.name: Jennifer & Bob
lender.loan_because: We want to help entreprenuers around the world whos only funding source may be a microlender.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a bank, setting up small businesses with the ability to accept credit card payments from customers for goods and services. My husband owns his own business, trimming and removing trees.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: My core values include respecting people who are self-reliant but work with others, honoring indigenous cultures, and living in harmony with the nature, and KIVA is in alignment with these values.
lender.occupational_info: I develop emissions control catalysts to help minimize pollution.

lender.name: vincent
lender.loan_because: I was lucky enough to have been born in the USA, and so I feel it's my duty to help distribute the wealth and abundance to under-served places and people around the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I build the internet.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I feel it is my responsibility and privilage to share what I'm fortunate enough to have earned, with those who are not as fortunate.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I beleave in free enterprise and what better way to help.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: Micro credit is an awesome idea that lets people make a better life for themselves through their own hard work. I think Kiva is the best idea yet for helping people. Investing in people and watching them grow makes me feel like we can make a difference, one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I'm the guy you call when your computer doesn't work

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: There is a need, and I can help in a small way.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: the need is compelling and the "interest" is unbeatable.

lender.name: Ahmet
lender.loan_because: Sometimes all it takes to get ahead in life is a helping hand at the right time. Women, who more often than not, make up the backbone of society especially in developing countries need an extra hand to get ahead. I concentrate on providing loans to hard working women in Mexico, Central America, South America and Asia.

lender.name: Madelyn
lender.loan_because: I made my first loan when my mom was very ill. It gave me a feeling of doing something positive when I felt so helpless in my own life.
lender.occupational_info: I work at an imaging center, running the mammography department. We test women, and occasionally men, for breast cancer.

lender.name: Ayami Togari
lender.loan_because: they do business much better than I do!!

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: it is just one small way I can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I create and manage the internal and external web presence for my employer.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: Each member in my family contributed their own money to help others in the world. Even our 2 year old daughter and our 4 year old son. God is good and we want others to see more of His goodness in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work with teenage students through the ministry of Young Life. Young Life is active in almost all the countries Kiva is working so check it out!

lender.name: Andrew and Lauren
lender.loan_because: Microloans are an easy and affordable way to directly change the life of an individual.
lender.occupational_info: We believe in the prudence of investing in the long term and love the opportunity to share this belief with others through Kiva.

lender.name: Gavagan/Lindsay wedding
lender.loan_because: We donated to small business owners instead of having expensive favors at our wedding

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: it's good to give others a chance to pursue their dreams for a happier, more secure life!
lender.occupational_info: I take photos and design brochures for various companies.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I like feeling connected to the rest of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working with a research group to find cures to different diseases.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: ex-manager's gifts

lender.name: Owen
lender.loan_because: I simply want to make the world a better place for the less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur

lender.name: DF SUWA
lender.loan_because: POOR PEOPLE NEED VENTURE CAPITAL :).

lender.name: Pojo
lender.loan_because: I've seen the world and want to help people improve their own circumstances in a socially responsible manner. I've lived in Myanmar, Nepal, Cambodia, Mexico and Japan and have visited many other countries.
lender.occupational_info: I work on odd jobs including drafting policy, strategic planning and field work for NGOs and governmental institutions.

lender.name: Valerio
lender.loan_because: It's correct to help the others in the measure in which he is able

lender.name: The Stevens Family
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Creating employment opportunities for craftspeople in poor communities

lender.name: Stefano e Luisa
lender.loan_because: it seems to be useful to the people

lender.name: vasudevan
lender.loan_because: poor family,sick mothers treatment.personal liabalities
lender.occupational_info: teacher who teach english to non english people

lender.name: Gerald
lender.loan_because: because of the economic situation in zimbabwe my parents are no longer able to finacially sponser me
lender.occupational_info: i am a student ... currently studying fine art.. my majors and experties are in new media, photography musical production

lender.name: Beorn
lender.loan_because: it's the best thing since sliced bread.
lender.occupational_info: Professional Speedskating is about skating fast on ice tracks.

lender.name: Bruce n Judy
lender.loan_because: We have lived and visited so many areas and have truly enjoyed the people and cultures. They deserve to realize their dreams, and we have been so fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: We help people. I help them do their job and Judy helps them when they are ill or injured.

lender.name: Midori
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Currently finishing up my bachelor's in Historic Preservation and Classics; going to attend graduate school for Classics for a master's.

lender.name: Alainna
lender.loan_because: I like to see people succeed.

lender.name: Henry
lender.loan_because: A friend of mine has shown me that I can make a difference. Thanks C-Dog for helping me as well as others.
lender.occupational_info: Helping to save life, one person at a time.

lender.name: Niall
lender.loan_because: Sharing is caring
lender.occupational_info: I'm part of a team of scientists and graphic designers, which create educational 3D animations explaining the action of drugs in the body. I'm also a musician/artist.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I loan because I think that it just might help...

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: I am blessed

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world!

lender.name: Lory23
lender.loan_because:
I choose to get one beer less every week and use the money to help someone. But not "help" and stop. I "help to build" occupation of a person and so build his trust in himself, his life, his character. And doing this with one beer less every week is woooooonderful, or not?! :)
Sorry for my english, but is not important here, right? ;)
lender.occupational_info: I administer unix servers for the italian aerospace company. A unix server is a strange computer wich is older than me but works veeeery well. An administrator is the person who like to resolve problems on unix servers.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: We are all expected to give.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and develop database-driven web applications as a side business

lender.name: Dan & Dione
lender.loan_because: We can think of few other things as meaningful as making these loans, investing in people. Together we CAN make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Network Support and Help Desk Coordinator. Also Volunteer for the Phoenix Fire Department as a Crisis Team Member.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: My husband gave me a gift of a Kiva voucher and i think its a great way of helping people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wife and mother to 2 kids.

lender.name: shawn
lender.loan_because: $25 will buy me four McDonald's quarterpounder meals and make me fat...but it might help improve someone else's life. That should be enough reason. Helping people who want to work and need only a small hand to do so is an amazingly good feeling.
lender.occupational_info: I cover the small day to day things that don't change the world, but mean the world to those involved.

lender.name: Rick and Brittney
lender.loan_because: It is inspiring to us that with just a little help from others, people can truly better themselves! We want to be part of this.
lender.occupational_info: Restaurant manager

lender.name: morgan
lender.loan_because: I want to help those in need who are hard working and passionate about what they can do.
lender.occupational_info: I work at an advertising agency, helping develop cool ideas that help grow our Clients' businesses.

lender.name: Meredith
lender.occupation: Regional Coordinator - The Ohio Benefit Bank
lender.loan_because: I like being able to help people in other countries fulfill basic human needs.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a program that helps people apply for public benefits. This program helps people get out of poverty.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: Many people just need a little lift to help them move up. Through giving I honor those who have helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I run a technical department that creates the means to improve the lives of shipboard and offshore workers.

lender.name: Jeret
lender.loan_because: I want to help but I don't know how.

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: having been a micro credit practitioner in developing countries, there is no option.
lender.occupational_info: Spiritualizing the world media to contact their group soul -- which would alter the planet in six months.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.occupational_info: Serving delicious food.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: "Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these, my brethren, ye have done it unto me."

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Kiva is such a brilliant program and should have all the participation and support it can get!
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Temple University in Philadelphia, PA. I am majoring in Marketing and hope to complete my education in a total of 3 years.

lender.name: Angel, Phil & Breanna
lender.loan_because: "The test of our progress is not whether we add more to the abundance of those who have much; it is whether we provide enough for those who have too little." Franklin D. Roosevelt

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: We all benefit and grow by supporting one another in whatever ways we can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professor of psychology at a university. I do research and teach courses on human development, families, and on women's development, in particular.

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because:
People all over the world have excellent business plans and ideas and simply need some capital to make the business successful.
I consider it a good investment.
lender.occupational_info: I work to determine whether or not businesses are profitable or are likely to be profitable.

lender.name: shannon
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and I want to help others.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people add a new chapter to their life story
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer and storyteller. I help people capture their most important stories and turn them into a book.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I want to help reach out to people around the world that could use a helping hand. I want them to know that there are people that care about them and want them to succeed in life.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: There are few things better than helping people help themselves --and their families and communities, too.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a nonprofit think tank that focuses on equity and opportunity in the US, and sustaining and advancing democratic values in a world of increasingly diffuse power.

lender.name: Kiva - Abbey North
lender.loan_because: We care.
lender.occupational_info: Finding ways to help where needed most.

lender.name: Cathi
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I make pottery and art. I have a herd of dairy goats! I am active in purebred dog (Boxer) rescue. I believe in the Golden Rule...

lender.name: Dagmar
lender.loan_because: it is important to support energetic people who have the will to make their living, support community and create a better environment.

lender.name: rants, etc
lender.loan_because: It's a great feeling to be able to help those that need it, and feel reassured that it's for real and not a scam.
lender.occupational_info: I create educational software to help students learn math.

lender.name: Sandra (NY)
lender.loan_because: It makes my heart smile.

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: I believe that commerce is the answer to ending poverty. There is a saying at my b-school (Thunderbird): "Borders frequented by trade seldom need soldiers."
lender.occupational_info: I am studying international finance. I hope to be involved in projects that bring the world closer together and build prosperity for everyone.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: every one deserves a chance,,,
lender.occupational_info: I help nurses do their job better by doing the day to day care (like bathing and feeding) for people who are sick

lender.name: Kaitlin
lender.occupation: estudiante de la Universidad de Texas

lender.name: Carole
lender.loan_because: I want to help other small businesses around the world. A part of my gross profits goes to KIVA.
lender.occupational_info: Jewelry Designer of one-of-a-kind bead and metal jewelry.

lender.name: Lise Avery
lender.loan_because: We are all one . If we each took the time to be more open-minded and to be kinder to each other, the world would be a much better place. Share the abundance.
lender.occupational_info: I am an independent producer of a jazz/standards and pop radio program with a Commercial with A Conscience identity. I create radio that makes people feel good, honors the classics and gives new artists a chance to be heard. We like to share information that can help people in need and help the environment .

lender.name: olasunbo
lender.loan_because: i need to get the necessry modern tools for designing
lender.occupational_info: i create a website for all categories wher people can interact or share ideas just like his very site.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: People are measured by what they do, not what they say.

lender.name: Nicki
lender.loan_because: When I had no money, people helped me. Now I'm returning the favor.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to immigrants.

lender.name: Nature_Initiative
lender.loan_because: We loan to people and businesses that in some way contribute to the environment by recycling, reusing or replenishing products or otherwise preserving or protecting the earth.
lender.occupational_info: We raise money to support environmental charities, activities and education.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: To create an ideal world one must choose to be an ideal person. I am grateful that Kiva proved once again that one person can make a difference to many.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because:
Everyone can use a helping hand.
I'm fortunate to live in a free society, have a good job, and a need to spread good karma throughout the world (one loan at a time). I like the idea that I can help someone achieve their dreams, even if we'll never meet.
lender.occupational_info: Lover of information, statistics, reading, and libraries. I love what I do, and want others to be as happy in their work as possible.

lender.name: christabel
lender.loan_because: I applaud the entrepreneurs for daring to want to change their lives for the better!

lender.name: Logan
lender.loan_because: micro-lending works.
lender.occupational_info: I am an English Teacher who enjoys working in agriculture. I currently manage our local farmers market as well as sell produce and compete as a professional athlete in mixed martial arts (MMA).

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I love food and want to support people who provide it for their community. Life happens over food and drink.
lender.occupational_info: I own and operate a new restaurant in Kansas, USA.

lender.name: Dustin Reed DeMoss
lender.loan_because: On behalf of my Karma and the win-win situation of micro-lending.

lender.name: Mohd Ismail
lender.loan_because: I need Loan $ 200.00 for pay Education fee for my doughter
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional Librariana

lender.name: Hui
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed and want to share this with the needed.
lender.occupational_info: I' ve been working as a teacher for years and feel happy to be helpful.

lender.name: SELASI
lender.occupational_info: I SEW DRESS FOR PEOPLE

lender.name: Dickson
lender.loan_because: I believe in the need to help others who are really in need. Effectiveness and sustainability are important factors.
lender.occupational_info: Analyzes emerging Internet trends and technologies, and evaluating their potential impact

lender.name: adewale
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO ACHIEVE MY GOALS IN LIFE AND TO TAKE CARE OF THE MEMBERS OF MY FAMILY
lender.occupational_info: WELL..I WOULD DESCRIBE MY WORK AS A VERY GOOD AND NICE WORK,BUT NEEDS MONEY TO START WITH,BCOS YOU CANT DO IT WITHOUT A WORKSHOP

lender.name: Dick & Sally
lender.loan_because: we enjoy helping others because we have been so blessed for 88 years.

lender.name: Paolo
lender.loan_because: Sono fortunato perchè sono nato in buona famiglia e sono nato in Italia. E' un DOVERE aiutare chi ha bisogno.

lender.name: Clara
lender.loan_because: It's totally cool. I started this as a birthday gift for my mother.
lender.occupational_info: I work to make sure that children in my community are safe.

lender.name: Ken & Ellen
lender.loan_because: This is an excellent way to help these small business owners to succeed. We are glad to be able to provide funding to help improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work with businesses to help them become more efficient, profitable, and provide better service.

lender.name: Lynette
lender.loan_because: This is my first loan. I hope my small amount helps someone in need.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: I believe most people do not want a hand out , they want a - HAND UP.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a travel corporation, assisting business travelers make their corporate travel arrangements to go to different places through out the world.

lender.name: lilly
lender.loan_because: i have lost my parents and ever since then i could not feed myself well much more completing my university degree.Please i will appreciate anyone that could take pity on my situation.
lender.occupational_info: I do not have any work.Rather i am currently financially crippled and close to death but God will save me

lender.name: Marion
lender.loan_because: I want to help people all over the world.

lender.name: Crayton
lender.loan_because: I lend because I can.
lender.occupational_info: optimistic.

lender.name: M..
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place. I was able to get loans when I needed them, and I want others to be able to also. Loans to seamstresses are made in memory of my friend Lesley.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have a chance at a good life, regardless of the circumstances in which they find themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help protect people from fraud when they shop online.

lender.name: Spacialle
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of support!
lender.occupational_info: sharing philosophy on what it means to be human, all over the world, from as many perspectives as I can uncover

lender.name: Katrina
lender.loan_because: I like to share what I can when I can and I also want to encourage and support entrepreneurship in other parts of the world as well as the US especially with women.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a college who sponsors a grant funded program that provides entrepreneurial counseling for individuals who want to start or grow their businesses.

lender.name: Paulo
lender.loan_because: I believe this is the right way to help who wants to live better and works for it.
lender.occupational_info: I manage projects and help others to do same.

lender.name: Stone Owl Cottage
lender.occupational_info: Changing the way people think, one person at a time!

lender.name: Julian
lender.loan_because: I can't afford to buy a house here in the UK...so whilst I'm trying to save a deposit, I can't think of a better use for my money than helping lift people out of poverty. I was lucky to be born into a country where the opportunities are great. I have nothing but admiration for those who are trying to better themselves. I just wish I had more to loan...
lender.occupational_info:
I find people jobs in charities throughout the UK. This brings me huge pleasure - but not half as much as loaning through the Kiva website...
What an amazing idea - and one that I whole-heartedly endorse. Keep it up!

lender.name: Roberta
lender.loan_because: by lending, I give hope! Hope is one of the necessary ingredients in the life of a small business owner. Small businesses do so many wonderful things for the community and the world.
lender.occupational_info: I delight in helping small businesses to grow and prosper. I do whatever is needed to define the company, its products and services to the prospective customer, the media and the world, mostly through writing. I've been helping to create success stories since 1984.

lender.name: J. L.
lender.loan_because: This is a small way to repay the kind people who helped me during the times in my life when I was in need, and give hope to others

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.whereabouts: T. Boput A. Ko Samui Surat Thani

lender.name: JP
lender.occupational_info: I work with music and computers.

lender.name: David Cox
lender.loan_because:
Kiva is a charity which I can get on board with. No middlemen taking cuts, PayPal has stepped in for the payment side with no expectations of profits and Kiva provides the opportunity to support the world economy in a straight forward and simple way that should be pushed and expanded upon in the future.
These loans are needed because they help people on a most basic level and will someday allow them to spend more of their capital on goods that enrich their lives.
No gigantic CEO salary and all of your money goes to the loan applicant; this is what a charity should be.
lender.occupational_info: I work with numbers a lot.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in individual lives, just as I am trying to make a difference in the life of my son (pictured).
lender.occupational_info: I help make high-tech stuff (computer software, Internet, wireless) more useful to people. My current "vertical" is financial services software.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I am able to.
lender.occupational_info: ...helping people to communicate throughout the EMEA region...

lender.name: Valerie Bhavana
lender.loan_because: Every year my Mom and Dad donate 365 dollars in my name to non-profits. This year they heard about KIVA on NPR and decided to support this new thing called micro-lending. Our family thinks that non-profits like KIVA do a better job at helping people and building a global community.
lender.occupational_info: Namaste, I am 6 years old. I am busy playing, learning and enjoying my summer holidays. Good Luck.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an international airline pilot who travels to Asia, Africa, Australia, and the Middle East.

lender.name: Buffy
lender.loan_because: I live a life of ease by complete chance. I want to help others who haven't had such luck.
lender.occupational_info: While my son naps, I try to sell people pretty things to wrap other things in.

lender.name: Rhett
lender.loan_because: I'm glad to help.
lender.occupational_info: I market computer software and technology products worldwide.

lender.name: Hector Lopez
lender.occupation: is a hodgepodge of abstract functions.
lender.loan_because: because I believe that we can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Living in the United States has given me a life that most people dream about. It is a life well funded by the union I have developed with my employer, my neighbors, and my family. I hope to pass on this blessing to others. I will publish a book of poetry in 2011 and will give all the proceeds to Kiva and my Kiva account. I am not sure how much money the book will produce but it is worth a try. Some of you have the resources and or talent to do more. Please do.

lender.name: moira
lender.loan_because: i have always encouraged my 4 daughters to help others.To be able to help other women and their families become independent ..that's the best gift Ican think of
lender.occupational_info: I have worked with children and their families all my working life, both in the classroom setting and in a social welfare agency.The families I try to help have a multiplicity of problems...social , emotional,intellectual,and financial..Some are new immigrants and /or refugees..It's a challenging job..but I love it...I truly believe that I learn as much from them as they do from me

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: this is a great alternative to a one-time donation.
lender.occupational_info: I provide financing to people wanting to buy a home.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: Make a difference :)
lender.occupational_info: Work as a design consultant designing electronics and software.

lender.name: Kary
lender.occupational_info: Real estate investor, Broker, Entrepreneur

lender.name: Clark
lender.loan_because: Because the need is so great. We all have to do something about it. KIVA makes it so easy. I get to know the people I am helping in some way by reading about their stories. It is making a world of difference for them and for me, because I have been so fortunate, and want to give back!

lender.name: Ganesh
lender.loan_because: I am thankful for the life God has given me. I want to share part of my well being with the needy.

lender.name: Tom & Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to support economic development (in a macro way) and help individuals developing their own livelihood (in a micro way).
lender.occupational_info: Tom has worked in capital markets for most of his career; Elizabeth is in public relations, mostly in healthcare

lender.name: jon
lender.loan_because: I read "banker to the poor" and felt this was a more realistic and focused way of helping poeple.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of sick babies.

lender.name: Matt
lender.occupational_info: Public finance investment banking

lender.name: Linda and Jim
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Chris, Teri & Kennedy
lender.loan_because: I have so much money I don't know what to do with it. I'm RICH!
lender.occupational_info: It doesn't matter what I do for work. The fact is, I'm good at keeping my family together. The other stuff doesn't really matter. I do what i do for them. Plain and simple.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to help other mothers creat a better life for all of our children.
lender.occupational_info: I work with doctors to help find new medicines for diseases.

lender.name: Kim's Best Friend
lender.loan_because: by the grace of God, life has been good to me.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: my mother raised our family of 7 children by herself, and I want to help other women in her situation

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: To help people maintain their livelihoods.
lender.occupational_info: Retail / Commercial / Mixed-Use development.

lender.name: Larry & Stefi Johnson
lender.loan_because: We wish to give all people a chance to be what they dream to be... No one should be denied the chance and this is a wonderful way to work together to accomplish that idea...
lender.occupational_info: Semi-retired, but spend my time writing and finding ways to help others. Stefi is a linguist with 7 languages and works in the medical field.

lender.name: Crush Groove Cosmetics
lender.loan_because: I want to empower female entrepreneurs in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: Crush Groove Cosmetics is an organic based makeup and skincare line in New York City.

lender.name: Kaleisia
lender.occupational_info: Creating a tea community that cares for all being around the globe.

lender.name: Silk
lender.loan_because: I care! I think this is a fabulous move towards ending poverty. :) I look forward to seeing lives changed. :)
lender.occupational_info: I work everyday helping customers receive the best service possible and seeing to their needs. :)

lender.name: Concepts Consulting
lender.loan_because: Giving time and material resources is part of a culture of community. Concepts Consulting Group is committed to giving locally and globally.
lender.occupational_info: Concepts Consulting Group cultivates environments for organizational reflection and decision making through processes that encourage creative thinking and collaboration, define effective action and plan for sustainable results.

lender.name: Ru
lender.loan_because:
I've seen and met angels wearing the disguise of ordinary people living ordinary lives. ~ Tracy Chapman
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does. ~ William James
lender.occupational_info: Creative, computer-geek mother; life lover.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving others the means to support themselves rather than simply a one-time handout.
lender.occupational_info: I am the pastor of a church.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I'v been lucky in life and I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help people make better business decisions by providing accurate information.

lender.name: Liesel
lender.loan_because: I have little, but they have less.

lender.name: corbett
lender.loan_because: It gives me great inner peace knowing I have helped others make a better life for their self and familys

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: My godfather doesn't want that my birth money will lay on a bank account until I am 18 years old.
lender.occupational_info: I am a baby boy, so not much work to do so far ...

lender.name: Bjoern V. Karlsen
lender.loan_because: I am glad to be able to reach out to other hard working people. Reading about projects and people give me a better insight and understanding of how people are dealing with life in other parts of our planet, which I believe is valuable lessons for most people in my part of the world.

lender.name: Girasolereale
lender.loan_because: We fell that loan can help to develop the idea and the work and maeby with our help they can start a good business and in the future loan to someone themself. It is like a big family chain ! GRAZIE
lender.occupational_info: We have a bed and breakfast in Rome where we live and there I have my Home artGallery where I paint, do my artcraft and restore antique objects.

lender.name: Arli
lender.loan_because: I'm turning 2 years old today and it's better to give than to receive.
lender.occupational_info: My work involved a lot of playing, running around, learning, and napping.

lender.name: Elina
lender.loan_because: "The World is a dangerous place, not because of those who do evil, but because of those who look on and do nothing." - Albert Einstein

lender.name: Luke R
lender.loan_because: "I have the audacity to believe that people everywhere can have three meals a day for their bodies, education and culture for their minds, and dignity, quality, and freedom for their spirits. I believe that what self-centered men have torn down, other-centered men can build up." - - Martin Luther King, Jr.
lender.occupational_info: Provide legal representation to those accused of crimes.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: It is a privilege.
lender.occupational_info: I brand and market financial services companies.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to help themselves and their families. When my parents immigrated from China to the USA, my father worked as a waiter and my mother as a seamtress. They worked hard and saved every cent possible while raising seven children. With the help of friends that loaned them small amounts of money, they were able to purchase a home. I believe that a little bit can make a big change in many lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office for the railroad and make announcements and display signs when our trains are late.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: There are people out there that need this money a whole lot more than I do.

lender.name: fiorella
lender.loan_because: in qualche parte del mondo, abbiamo troppo, troppo poco per altri milioni di persone

lender.name: Bernardine
lender.loan_because: It is a way to show my gratitude for help given to me and to help others improve their lives and futures.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: We want to assist those who work hard to better themselves and their communities.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: Everyone in the world should have the chance to support themselves and their family. We are very happy that in this small way we can help make a difference. God Bless

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.occupational_info: I collect discarded medical equipment and supplies and give them away.

lender.name: Marcos
lender.loan_because: I can. And it's a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I serve God in any way that I can.

lender.name: Jin
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: My Work: Making profitable short-term and long-term investments in various companies (public and private), assets and projects.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: i'm blessed, and it's best to spread that around a little.
lender.occupational_info: i help groups of people work better together.

lender.name: Robert
lender.occupational_info: Design and manufacture of products

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of microloaning and I particularly appreciate how Kiva tells me about each entrepreneur and allows me to select someone to help.
lender.occupational_info:
I write about creativity, innovation and "ideas so fresh... they should be slapped."
To me, Kiva is a fantastic example of a fresh idea, because it makes microlending approachable for everyone, and connects lenders with the people they're helping.
Plus, I love it because Kiva allows lenders to keep helping people by recycling their money to help new entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: if we all do our small parts, we can change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 9 and 10 year old childen.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I know that human beings, even in the direst of conditions, can do amazing things if given the chance, and I am thrilled to be that chance!

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I have enough.
lender.occupational_info: Lawyer representing low-income people and senior citizens in civil cases.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: It works.
lender.occupational_info: Assisting those who wish to learn; babysitting those who do not.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance at success.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to support people as they realize the opportunities they make for themselves. I believe that microfinancing goes farther than charity.

lender.name: Emile
lender.loan_because: Sometimes, we just need a break.
lender.occupational_info: I love my store, my work is fun and I couldn't have done it without the support and help from my friends. That's why I want to give back and keep the flow going.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: a small sum of money can make all the difference.
lender.occupational_info: I study literature and foreign languages.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that I can directly help someone and positively effect their lives. What a gift.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the entertainment business in television production, producing TV spots and programming.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I think it's important to give back to the community, and to help those who need it the most.
lender.occupational_info: I coach people who have lost their jobs due to downsizing. I help provide training, teach and empower them how to interview, set employment goals, and assist in the development of their resumes and training.

lender.name: Zena
lender.loan_because: I am all for "when you get, give and when you learn, teach"
lender.occupational_info: I have an Agency which provide Personal Care services for the Elderly.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to succeed.

lender.name: Britt
lender.loan_because: I realize how fortunate I am to live in the developed world.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I believe God has given those of us with more resources the responsibility and joy of being able to help and support those who have less.
lender.occupational_info: I help people improve their processes, and make their offices productive.

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: I respect and admire individuals who dare to pursue their dreams.

lender.name: Anna Maria
lender.loan_because: I am a very blessed person, and I believe the more fortunate a person is, the more responsibility she has to give back to the world. Also, I recognize and value the interconnectedness of people and their well-being on a global scale.
lender.occupational_info: I provide administrative support to six financial analysts at an investment firm in New York City.

lender.name: Robert and Erika Wafle
lender.loan_because: Helping others is the most important part of our lives.

lender.name: Angelica
lender.loan_because: This is a great opportunity to help people who need it most.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Junior at Colorado State University and work as a waitress also.

lender.name: Nico
lender.loan_because: My parents are teaching me to be caring and generous

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: No one gets by in this life alone. We are all brothers and sisters, so what's a few dollars amongst family?
lender.occupational_info: Attorney

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I want to empower individuals

lender.name: Usama
lender.loan_because: It's not mine anyway.
lender.occupational_info: customer service

lender.name: Leong/Allan Family
lender.loan_because: We believe that helping people to be self-reliant is one of the best ways to support people in developing nations.
lender.occupational_info: Nigel provides communications support to NGOs and help them to promote their work via the web and other communications channels. Leslie is a photographer mostly focused on culture, landscape, people and wildlife. Her art endeavors focus on recycling, reusing and reclaiming materials.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate in life.

lender.name: Leanne
lender.loan_because: It's the absolute least I can do to help. : )
lender.occupational_info: I create artwork for different companies to be used in books, games, and other things.

lender.name: raju
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do for me.
lender.occupational_info: love to support these kind of microfinance projects.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I'm a closet communist who believes in the power of capitalism
lender.occupational_info: I'm going to school in Massachusetts and missing California.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me so much in my life. I want to take the gifts that he has given me and pass them on to those who need it.
lender.occupational_info: I support computer applications. I also work on computer hardware on the side (fixing PCs for individuals).

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: People everywhere deserve the opportunity to work for better lives and happier children.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy.
lender.occupational_info: Caring for people

lender.name: Nige and Rudie
lender.loan_because: We travel quite a lot and it makes us realise how fortunate we are. Kiva is a wonderful opportunity to help give people a step up towards a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I market the English Language Teaching books of Cambridge University Press to English Language teachers in Asia.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Kiva is fundamental free enterprise capitalism at work.
lender.occupational_info: We help people learn to read and think by discussing literature, plays, short stories, history, philosophy and science. Join us in Northern California for a discussion; check our website and sign up for our free email newsletter.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I hope for the happiness of all people.
lender.occupational_info: I put people to sleep so they do not feel the pain of surgery.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I have always been interested in the concept of micro-lending. It makes me feel good to help a business get off the ground, and to see success.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a Lawyer.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: People like me in the United States have many, many advantages. As individuals, we need to share with the rest of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I do information technology consulting. I am also a singer, songwriter and actor.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: Social justice begins with small steps, like microfinance. I am especially interested in helping women around the world become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I am an administrator for a nonprofit domestic violence organization.

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.loan_because: I was given the money as a birthday gift and I wanted to share it.

lender.name: Rainbow Path
lender.loan_because: This is our way of sharing our profits with our fellow human beings across the world.Peace!
lender.occupational_info: A Bookstore for the new millenium!

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I want to start doing more to help people. I think microfinance is a great idea and look forward to providing people across the world with more access to much needed capital.

lender.name: Lynette
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: TU Wesley Foundation
lender.loan_because: Because we can.

lender.name: Read Books
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain a collection of books that elementary school aged children can borrow and read.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: the current system of advancing individual development is failing and does not reach down below the corruption and bureaucracy of existing governments.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to understand how development influences health and use this research to educate students and influence policies related to diet, health, and development.

lender.name: thomas
lender.loan_because: I loan through KIVA because I believe in their philosophy. It was an idea that was a long time coming. Congrats KIVA !!
lender.occupational_info: I work in the television production industry.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and this is a great way to give back. Such a small amount of money can make a huge difference in the world, one entrepreneur at a time!
lender.occupational_info: I now spend my time helping young entrepreneurs start exciting new companies...

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I believe in capitalism...and because I want to do what I can to make the world a better place

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: With finite funds for assisting people in need, I can help many more people by recycling my $ with loans than I can with charitable donations.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to help support women around the world
lender.occupational_info: I work in Human Resources in workplace safety

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: It takes so little of my world but means so much to their world.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: why wouldn't I?

lender.name: Roseanna
lender.loan_because: How can you not?

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I am self-employed and love the idea of helping someone else to establish their business.
lender.occupational_info: I find mortgage money for residential and commercial property purchases.

lender.name: MaryK
lender.loan_because: I have lived in many third world countries and know the situation.
lender.occupational_info: I work with retired senior people to enchance there quality of life.

lender.name: Seth
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to improve their standard of living through hard work but without a place to start, that dream can be stifled.
lender.occupational_info: I am most interested in designing buildings which make cities better places to live.
